1.1.hd_quote: Creation is independent of will. Time is everything.
1.1.behavioral_axis: Builds creative identity from a strong inner base before showing it.
1.1.shadow_axis: Tries to force mutation with ego/will and gets unstable.

1.2.hd_quote: Love is light. Venus exalted as a symbol of beauty in individual expression.
keywords: leave me alone and let it happen
1.2.behavioral_axis: Radiates unique creative energy without trying; inspires by just existing.
1.2.shadow_axis: Withdraws or sulks if pushed to perform on demand.

1.3.hd_title: The energy to sustain creative work
1.3.hd_quote: Mars exalted as the symbol of a profound need for self-expression.
1.3.behavioral_axis: Builds authentic voice by testing, failing, iterating in public.
1.3.shadow_axis: Gets pulled into materialism and loses the mutative thread.

1.4.hd_title: Aloneness as the medium of creativity
1.4.hd_quote: When one has to be creative, one needs to be alone.
1.4.behavioral_axis: Turns personal self-expression into a recognizable frequency others can gather around.
1.4.shadow_axis: Gets pulled into marketing/promotion and loses the mutative edge.

1.5.hd_quote: This assumption that one is creative is very attractive to society.
1.5.behavioral_axis: Gets cast as the one who can redefine the vibe for everyone.
1.5.shadow_axis: Becomes a lightning rod when projections aren’t met; performs creativity instead of living it.

1.6.hd_quote: You will never live long enough to appreciate the impact of that mutation.
1.6.behavioral_axis: Becomes a walking example of pure individuality; ‘this is my frequency.’
1.6.shadow_axis: Detaches and appears superior or cold; feels too far ahead of the era.
